abstract: China Merchants Bank is interested in buying into a planned initial public offering of shares by Visa, the credit card network, but any deal would first need Chinese regulatory approvals, its president Ma Weihua said on Monday.
lead_paragraph: China Merchants Bank is interested in buying into a planned initial public offering of shares by Visa, the credit card network, but any deal would first need Chinese regulatory approvals, its president Ma Weihua said on Monday.

headline.main: China Merchants Shows Interest in Visa I.P.O.
